extractions.title: Alzheimer disease is (sometimes) highly heritable: Drivers of variation in heritability estimates for binary traits, a systematic review.

extractions.trait: Alzheimer's disease (SNP-based heritability, GCTA) - Lee et al. 2013
extractions.source_text: The first LOAD GCTA heritability estimates were published in 2013. The resulting LOAD heritability estimate of 24% was based on a sample of 7,139 participants (3,290 cases, 3,849 controls) that includ

extractions.trait: Alzheimer's disease (SNP-based heritability, GCTA) - Ridge et al. 2013
extractions.source_text: Ridge et al. (2013) leveraged the Alzheimer’s Disease Genetics Consortium (ADGC) dataset, including 10,922 individuals (5,708 cases, 5,214 controls), and estimated a higher heritability estimate of 33

extractions.trait: Alzheimer's disease (SNP-based heritability, GCTA) - Ridge et al. 2016
extractions.source_text: A 2016 update included data from 30 studies within the ADGC, and the heritability estimate increased to 53%. This study included only 9,699 individuals (3,877 cases, 5,822 controls).

extractions.trait: Alzheimer's disease (SNP-based heritability, GCTA) - Lo et al. 2019
extractions.source_text: Lo et al. (2019) made a methodological advance by incorporating cohort indicators that correspond to the specific cohort from which individuals were recruited, into their heritability estimation to ac

extractions.trait: Alzheimer's disease (SNP-based heritability, GCTA) - Wang et al. 2021
extractions.source_text: Wang et al. (2021) similarly incorporated cohort indicators in their analysis of 2-phase ADGC data, obtaining an expected comparable heritability estimate of 21% [78].

extractions.trait: Alzheimer's disease (SNP-based heritability, LDSC) - Zheng et al. 2017
extractions.source_text: Zheng et al. (2017) reported similar observed-scale heritability estimates of 6.88%...

extractions.trait: Alzheimer's disease (SNP-based heritability, LDSC) - Chen et al. 2021
extractions.source_text: Chen et al. (2021) reported similar observed-scale heritability estimates of 6.80%.

extractions.trait: Alzheimer's disease (SNP-based heritability, LDSC) - Brainstorm Consortium 2018
extractions.source_text: Brainstorm Consortium et al. (2018) provided a liability-scale heritability estimate of 13%, using a population prevalence of 17% for the transformation [88].

extractions.title: Heterogeneity in the Genetic Architecture of Alzheimer disease (AD) across Ancestry Groups

extractions.title: Unveiling the genetic architecture of white matter tracks through unsupervised deep representation learning of fractional anisotropy images

extractions.trait: UDIP-FA (unsupervised deep learning-derived FA phenotypes; mean SNP-heritability across 128 UDIP-FAs)
extractions.source_text: UDIP-FAs exhibited significantly estimated SNP heritability ( P < 2.20e-16, Mann–Whitney U test, mean = 50.81%).
